detail_desc: Large wash bag in soft, transparent plastic with an opening at the top and a chunky zip. Size approx. 9x18x32 cm.
Short, sleeveless lace dress with a contrasting colour lining. Opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and a raw-edge hem.
Cargo trousers in washed Oxford cotton with side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, seams at the knees and drawstring hems.
Baby Exclusive. Tights in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the tights is organic.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend. Deep neckline with lacing and short sleeves with a small frill trim.

Weekend bag in woven fabric with contrasting colour details. Two handles, a zip and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap at the top. Adjustable tabs on the short sides that can be used to adjust the size of the bag. One outer compartment at the front and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 22x31x48 cm.
Cropped top in soft viscose jersey with a stand-up collar and short sleeves. Vertical, overlocked seams down the front and back, and overlocked edges around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Short dress in an Oxford cotton weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front, short sleeves, chest pockets and patch front pockets with a flap. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.
Fitted, long-sleeved dress in a soft jacquard knit containing glittery threads.
Trainers in fabric and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Linings and moulded insoles in mesh, and chunky soles.

Calf-length dress in patterned mesh with a frilled collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with overlocked edges, a seam at the waist with a discreet drawstring at the sides, and seams with a small frill trim and concealed elastication around the skirt to create tiers. Lined.
Striped rugby shirt in slub cotton jersey with a cotton twill collar, concealed button placket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and short slits in the sides.

Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist, sewn-in creases at the front and a zip and concealed button at one side.
Socks in a fine knit containing glittery threads.

Boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded, patterned ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip in the side and reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short fitted dress in jersey containing glittery threads with a tear-shaped opening at the back, small stand-up collar with hook-and-eye fasteners at the back and long sleeves. Jersey lining.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
Jacket in piqué made from a cotton blend with a decorative buttonhole on one lapel, a fake welt chest pocket and patch front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Hat in braided paper straw with a fringe-trimmed brim. Width of brim 11 cm.
Fitted lace dress with short sleeves, a mesh yoke and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Bag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap, zip at the top and inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 6x15.5x24 cm.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif, round neckline and gently rounded hem.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.

Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats at the top and wide, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Organza flounce on the inside of the shoulders for a puffed effect.
Sleeveless jersey top with ties at the hem.
High-waisted linen shorts with pleats at the top, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal front pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs with creases at the front.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.
H&M SUPPORTS WWF. Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in crushed velvet with thin elastic shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-shaped opening and buttons at the front. Short sleeves, and elasticated seam with a tasselled drawstring at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Purl-knit jumper in a cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in a textured organic cotton weave with elastication and a tie belt at the waist, and side pockets.
Cotton jersey vest tops with narrow shoulder straps, a small scalloped trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
Strappy top in soft jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a slightly deeper neckline front and back.

Long dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Silicone trim at the top, support panels in the bodice and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist and an asymmetric, draped skirt. Partly lined.
Pull-on shorts in stretch cotton twill with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly and fake front pockets.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Fitted top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Slightly longer hooded top in soft fleece with appliqués and embroidery. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted jersey top with short sleeves, a visible seam down the front and an asymmetric hem. Slightly shorter front with a draped detail at the hem.
Short skirt in woven fabric with decorative seams. Zip at the back. Lined.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 3 cm.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves, a V-neck and gathers at the front for a draping effect.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with concealed elastication at the front of the top.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short jumper in chunky, textured-knit cotton with a higher neckline, low dropped shoulders and extra-long sleeves. Ribbed section at the top that accentuates the shoulders and creates a boxy fit. Decorative, contrasting colour stitching around the neckline, at the shoulders and around the sleeves, cuffs and hem. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with lace details, a low waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved top in soft stretch jersey with a slightly wider neckline and slits in the sides.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, round neck and long, lace raglan sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Wide, off-the shoulder top in soft slub jersey with inset lace trims at the front and on the sleeves. Elastication and a short frill trim at the top, long, slightly wider sleeves with pin-tucks, and elasticated cuffs with a frill trim.
Short-sleeved sports top in airy, organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Small purse in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a zip at the top that continues down one short side. One outer compartment. Lined. Height 9 cm. Width 13 cm.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with a wide elasticated flounce with broderie anglaise at the top, and an elasticated hem.
Satin mules with a wide, padded foot strap. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Ankle boots with rounded toes, a zip in one side with a large ring, and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Top in a crinkled viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and gathers at the top, both front and back.
Push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in microfibre with lace details. Lined cups, a wrapover front for easier nursing access and a wide, elasticated hem. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Lightly padded parka in woven fabric with a brushed velvety finish. Detachable, lined hood with a quilted edge and fake drawstring with leather details, a stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard and wind flap with toggles. Patch front pockets with a flap and button, fake welt chest pockets, a small appliqué on one sleeve, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Removable lining.
Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a straight hem with slits in the sides.
Shirt in imitation leather with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft fleece with a lined, drawstring hood, zipped side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a contrasting colour trim around the neckline and sleeves.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.
Short, fitted halterneck dress in ribbed jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. V-neck and decorative straps at the back. Lined.
Ribbed vest top in soft organic cotton jersey. Lace around the neckline and armholes and overlocked hem.
Body in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck with a wide lace trim. Seam at the hips and press-studs at the crotch.
Short-sleeved dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and asymmetric skirt. Lined.
Wide-fitting jumper in a soft, fine-knit alpaca and wool blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Bolero in a loose cotton knit with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a ribbed edge around the opening. No fasteners.

Shorter jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with a round, ribbed neckline and long, wide sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Cut out section at the back with sewn-on ties at the back of the hem.
